name: Yummy FTP Bookmark File
summary: Learn about .BKMK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Yummy FTP bookmarks can be viewed and edited using the Bookmarks menu. They are saved by default in the following directory:

description: Bookmark file created by Yummy FTP, an FTP client for Mac OS X; saves an FTP Internet location such as a Web server directory for uploading files; used for saving shortcuts that can be accessed through the program interface.
